title: How to Have the Best Kwanzaa Ever
description: Willimena is putting the final touches on her Kwanzaa set and her list for Santa when her parents tell her some bad news - Aunt Laura has lost her job, and she needs to borrow some money from them. There will be no spare cash left for toys this year, so Willimena and her sister Tina must find other ways to celebrate.
author: Valerie Wilson Wesley
